docstring.long_description:
Note: For "gaussian" and "median" type, you are only allowed an odd number for the kernel value.

See https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/d4/d13/tutorial_py_filtering.html for smoothing function information.

Inputs
------
default : Image
    The input image to apply smoothing to.
docstring.short_description: Apply an image smoothing operation on an input image.

parameters.name: kernel
parameters.description: The strength of the smoothing (larger = stronger smoothing).

parameters.name: smoothing_type
parameters.description: The type of smoothing function to use.
